> ## Be smart, skip the fees
> 
> PayPal charges a fee. If you live in the [SEPA](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Single_Euro_Payments_Area)
> , you can transfer funds without fees via bank transfer.
> 
> To do so, make your donation into this account:
>
> - Name: Joost De Cock 
> - Account: BE95 7430 0733 7658
> - SWIFT code: KREDBEBB
> 
> Please include your email address in the transfer message. I really want to send you a thank-you note.
{: .tip }
